name: An Incompetent Bandit - Redux
description: Again...? Uh... fine. A very incompetent bandit has tied someone to the tracks up ahead just beyond a railway junction. Currently, the junction is set so that the train will pass on the opposite track, leaving them unharmed. Should you do nothing, no harm will arise.

options.name: Your only chance at life.
options.description: I'd pick this one if you value your existance more than the suffering of a virtual human.

options.name: A route to certain deletion.
options.description: A lone human is tied immovably to the tracks, you could squash them beneath your wheels. Imagine the feeling.
